# sparsemixmat

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of sparsemixmat is to provide a framework for matrix-variate data sparse model-based clustering.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("AndreaCappozzo/sparsemixmat")
```
